name: XWUI Timeline Component
description: Production-quality vertical timeline component for displaying chronological events. Supports left, right, alternate, and alternate-reverse positioning modes, theme colors, custom icons, opposite content, ARIA attributes, animations, and full accessibility. Useful for activity feeds, history, event displays, and chronological data visualization.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

position.description: Layout position of timeline items. 'left' positions all items on the left, 'right' on the right, 'alternate' alternates starting from left, 'alternate-reverse' alternates starting from right

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the timeline root element

ariaLabel.description: ARIA label for the timeline list for screen readers

ariaLabelledBy.description: ID of element that labels the timeline for screen readers

animateOnRender.description: Whether to animate items when timeline is rendered

dotSize.description: Size of the timeline dot markers

connectorWidth.description: Width of the connector line between items in pixels

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of timeline items to display

id.description: Unique identifier for the timeline item (required)

title.description: Title text for the timeline item (required)

description.description: Description text for the timeline item

date.description: Date string displayed above the title

oppositeContent.description: Content displayed on the opposite side (for alternate modes)

icon.description: Icon for the timeline dot. Can be SVG HTML string or HTMLElement

color.description: Color for the timeline dot. Can be theme color ('primary', 'secondary', 'success', 'warning', 'error', 'info', 'grey') or custom color string (hex, rgb, etc.)

dotVariant.description: Visual variant of the timeline dot

ariaLabel.description: ARIA label for this timeline item for screen readers

ariaDescribedBy.description: ID of element that describes this timeline item

className.description: Additional CSS class name for this timeline item

onClick.description: Click handler function for this timeline item (not serializable in JSON)
